name: KoboldKroniken
description:
Dive into a mysterious realm under the earth! KoboldKroniken will take you to exciting adventures and a unique, new world - the world of goblins. Explore the catacombs of the goblin world Kwertz in Dungeon Runner, collect trophies in your school locker, find kokkatts and grab umpf eggs for umpf caretaker game.
In the dungeon runner you control your own goblin avatar through the twisting and fantastic catacombs of Kwertz. With skill, brains and a little magic, you'll get deeper and deeper into the goblin world. Overcome cunning traps, solve tricky puzzles and beware of dangerous enemies. In the catacombs you'll also find valuable kokkatts, lots of useful items or magic abilities, and occasionally rare umpf eggs. You can hatch, feed, and care for the Ümpf eggs in the Ümpf Caretaker game - and then sell them for a hefty price, because each kokkatt can be used to buy items and spell abilities, cool upgrades, or accessories for your personal avatar.
Become part of the great KoboldKroniken cosmos today and experience the exciting story interactively, digitally and across media. Whether together with the KoboldKroniken books or just like that - open the gate to Kwertz on your PC, because your time has come now: Time for mischief, time for fantastic fun!
